name: pantyhose
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 US (UK tights) a piece of clothing made of very thin material that tightly covers the feet, legs, and lower part of the body, often worn under skirts and dresses: She bought a new pair of pantyhose. Oh no, I've got a run/hole in my pantyhose.

a piece of clothing made of a thin material that stretches to cover the body below the waist, including the legs and feet, and that is usually worn under dresses or skirts by women and girls: She bought a new pair of pantyhose.
